DOC.brief_summary: The Quadratus Lumborum ( QL ) Block ultrasound-guided technique describe Rafael Blanco 2007 . The nerve low abdominal wall anesthetize inject local anesthetic close anterior border quadratus lumborum muscle . In randomized , control , double-blinded study ultrasound-guided QL-blocks 20 female patient cesarean delivery compare placebo control group 20 patient investigate analgesic consumption , pain level , opioid related side effect mobilization .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound-guided Quadratus Lumborum Block Postoperative Pain Relief After Cesarean Delivery
DOC.criteria: Patients cesarean delivery American Society Anesthesiologists classification ( ASA ) < 3 adequate communication skill Body mass index < 32 ASA > 2 chronic pain neurological illness/ neuropathy contraindication local anesthetic
